/usr/bin/c++    -fopenmp -g     -o FastLSH -rdynamic /usr/local/hadoop/lib/native/libhdfs.so /usr/lib/jvm/default-java/jre/lib/amd64/libjawt.so /usr/lib/jvm/default-java/jre/lib/amd64/server/libjvm.so lib/googletest/googlemock/gtest/libgtest.a -lmemcached -lhiredis -lmpi -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/hadoop/lib/native:/usr/lib/jvm/default-java/jre/lib/amd64:/usr/lib/jvm/default-java/jre/lib/amd64/server
